https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1iWyAQDwS6bgQIcAonCwzuLQbPc.jpg "Iskra" is the codename for the plan of the operation of the Soviet troops to break the blockade of Leningrad. In January 1943, the blockade of Leningrad was broken. A corridor 8-11 km wide was formed between Lake Ladoga and the front line. Blokada: Operatsiya Iskra
